title: Ticket #3502: Want to know jobs waiting to upload
description: When looking at a busy schedd it would be nice to have a way to determine who is being impacted by a long upload wait queue. In many instances they may have done it to themselves. This means one could look at the jobs waiting and similar jobs running to perhaps find jobs which could be redesigned. Things like placing files such that execute node fetches could occur.
remarks:

This is part of the ongoing work in #3487 and #3333
